posts.post_title: Sold : one of only 3 single pop Tolstoi's Joe Dunn Brooklyn SOLD
posts.post_content:
There are only three single pop Tolstoi's between PSA and SGC Chief Bender (trees in background) 1 PSA graded, Ira Thomas 1 SGC graded and Joe Dunn 1 SGC (Authentic).

$450 paypal f&f or $468 paypal goods shipping in the U.S. included Sold
